metadata.dc:author: Gigirey, L M
metadata.dc:description: The paper deals with an audiometric and prosthetic study done among 500 individuals, with the aim of assessing their auditive condition and subsequent social rehabilitation (in the same residences they live), by means of audiometric control and "in situ" audioprosthetic adaptation.
metadata.dc:title: Estado auditivo de la poblacion gallega de la tercera edad.
[Hearing of the aged in the Galician population].
